entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 2400 metres near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
